pages.title: The Basics
pages.text: Each enemy has a ratity. Most are common/trash mobs, and easy to kill. As you level up you will start seeing higher rarity mobs. These won't be easy to kill but they give better loot!

pages.title: More info
pages.text: You can notice their rarity by their name colors. Goes by: gray > green > yellow etc. Generally the more health the mob has, the more dangerous it is. So that might be easier to remember.
